title: following provisions of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Act
heading: 2. The 30th day of August 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of August 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Act 
2022 (No. 20 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

Part 1; 

section 6, in so far as it relates to the insertion, in the Health Act 
1970 (No. 1 of 1970), of subsections (7) to (11) of section 67E. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 August 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [425] 3

title: following provisions of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints the 30th of August 2022 as the day on which certain 
sections of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No.2) Act 2022 come into 
operation. These sections provide that the Minister for Health can, with the 
consent of the Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform, set the fees to be 
paid to service providers under the free contraception scheme for women aged 
17-25.
